info.title: Stork app
info.description: This is a documentation of stork app

accessToken.description: JWT access token (use as Authorization: Bearer <token>)

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's profile.

patch.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile. Use `multipart/form-data` when uploading an avatar in field `photoURL`.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user to update.

get.description: Public endpoint. Returns data only for 1st week of pregnancy (without authorization).
Retrieves all tasks for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new task for the authenticated user.

patch.description: Updates a specific task's completion status.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task to update.

get.description: Private endpoint. Returns data about week number, number of days until due, information about baby and tip for mom.
Private endpoint. Returns data about the baby's development for the selected week.
Private endpoint. Returns data about the mother's body for the selected week.

get.summary: Get all diary entries of the current user
get.description: Returns a paginated list of diary entries for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter entries created on/after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter entries created on/before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: emotions
parameters.description: Filter by emotion ids. Repeat the parameter for multiple values.

post.description: Creates a new diary entry for the authenticated user.

description.example: I had a great walk in the park, enjoyed the sunshine, and felt really happy and relaxed.

patch.description: Updates specific fields of an existing diary entry for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: The ID of the diary entry to update.

delete.description: Deletes a specific diary entry for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: The ID of the diary entry to delete

204.description: Diary entry successfully deleted (no content returned)

get.description: Returns a list of all available emotions.

development.example: На цьому тижні кісткова система малюка продовжує активно розвиватися

fact.example: Серце вашого малюка зараз перекачує близько 25 літрів крові на добу

example: Не забувайте про зволоження шкіри живота та стегон

userId.description: The user ID of the task owner.

sensationDescr.example: Ви можете помітити, що вам стало важче дихати носом

tip.example: Додайте до раціону продукти, багаті на Омега-3

description.example: I had a great walk in the park, enjoyed the sunshine, and felt really happy and relaxed.
